title: NDTV News-World-news
description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

entries.title: On Camera, Woman Struck Dead By Train In Mexico While Taking Selfie
entries.description: Mexican outlets said the woman was in her 20s and said she was with her son and children from a nearby school.

entries.title: Fancy Teacups, Rs 3.8 Crore Pool: 5 Times UK PM Rishi Sunak Came Under Fire
entries.description: Despite his historic appointment as the first British-Asian Prime Minister and the first Hindu to hold the office, Mr Sunak's tenure has not been without controversy.

entries.title: Its Forces Halved, Hamas Relies On Hit-And-Run Tactics To Frustrate Israel
entries.description: Hamas has seen about half its forces wiped out in eight months of war and is relying on hit-and-run insurgent tactics to frustrate Israel's attempts to take control of Gaza, U.S. and Israeli officials told Reuters.

entries.title: In A First, Paris Olympics Village To Have "Mindfulness Area" For Athletes
entries.description: Three years after gymnastics superstar Simone Biles put the mental health of athletes centre stage at the Tokyo Olympics, this year's Paris Games will demonstrate how greater awareness has translated into better care and support.

entries.title: US Regulators Target Microsoft, OpenAI Violations In AI Antitrust Probe
entries.description: The US Justice Department and the Federal Trade Commission have reached a deal that allows them to proceed with antitrust investigations into the dominant roles that Microsoft, OpenAI and Nvidia play in the artificial intelligence industry.

entries.title: World's Most Powerful Rocket, That May Send Man To Mars, To Be Tested Soon
entries.description: Starship, SpaceX's massive prototype rocket that may one day send humans to Mars, is poised for its next flight on Thursday.

entries.title: Woman, 25, Charged With Assault After Milkshake Thrown At Nigel Farage
entries.description: The 60-year-old later joked about the incident saying "my milkshake brings all the people to the rally".

entries.title: This Underwater Art Gallery Is Protecting Corals From Climate Change
entries.description: On the Caribbean seafloor, an unusual sculpture gallery is taking shape with an equally unusual purpose: to provide homes for corals under threat from tourism and climate change.

entries.title: Kate Middleton May Never Return To Her Royal Duties, Claims Report
entries.description: The 42-year-old has been away from public life since mid-March when she revealed she was in the “early stages” of preventative chemotherapy treatments.

entries.title: 30 Dead In Strikes On Gaza School, Israel Says Was Targetting "Terrorists"
entries.description: The Israeli military said Thursday it had carried out a deadly strike on a UN school in Gaza that it said housed a Hamas compound, with the militant group saying the attack killed at least 27 people.

entries.title: US Approves Sale Of F-16 Parts Worth $80 Million To Taiwan
entries.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the sale to Taiwan of F-16 fighter jet spare and repair parts for an estimated $80 million, the Pentagon's Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Wednesday.

entries.title: Tokyo To Launch Dating App To Boost Birth Rate, Elon Musk Reacts
entries.description: Users will be required to submit documentation proving they are legally single and sign a letter stating they are willing to get married.

entries.title: Russia Can Arm Countries That Could Attack The West, Warns Putin
entries.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday criticised the West's delivery of long-range weapons to Ukraine, arguing Moscow could arm other countries with similar weapons to attack Western targets.

entries.title: After Hush Money Conviction, Trump Patches Up With Billionaire Donors
entries.description: For big donors, the light had drained a bit from Trump's powerful aura in the wake of the chaos surrounding his 2020 loss at the polls to Joe Biden.

entries.title: 'Holy Grail' Breakthrough As Major Cause Of Bowel Disease Discovered
entries.description: The breakthrough came as researchers discovered a part of DNA only active in some immune cells which causes inflammation in the bowels.

entries.title: 1 In 4 Children Under The Age Of 5 Face "Severe" Food Poverty: UNICEF
entries.description: More than one in four children under the age of five globally live in "severe" food poverty, UNICEF has warned -- meaning more than 180 million are at risk of experiencing adverse impacts on their growth and development.

entries.title: Man Dies After Falling From Famed 'Mission Impossible' Cliff In Norway
entries.description: Authorities have not released the man's identity but said they recovered his phone and identification.

entries.title: 4 Dead, Dozens Injured As Trains Collide In Czech Republic
entries.description: Four people died and dozens were injured when an express train crashed head-on with a freight train in the Czech city of Pardubice late Wednesday, an emergency services spokesperson said.

entries.title: US Court Halts Trump's 2020 Election Interference Case
entries.description: A Georgia appeals court on Wednesday froze all proceedings in the election interference case against former US president Donald Trump and his co-defendants in the southern state.

entries.title: Russia Could Use Nuclear Weapons If...: Putin Warns West
entries.description: President Vladimir Putin, asked about the risks of nuclear war over Ukraine, cautioned the West on Wednesday that Russia could use all available means to defend itself if its sovereignty or territorial integrity were threatened.
